FGO 3T Simulator **WIP**

For all you three turn hyper farmers.

How to use

Servants Manager Quests Manager Battle Simulator

Please enter all stats the servant would have, including their CE stats and innate stats, and then click "Add Servant" to save them.

Please select a class.
Please select a servant.

Valid Flat Attack up required.
Valid NP Damage % up required.
Valid NP starting charge required.

Enter all enemy stats and then click "Save Quest" to save this quest.
